name: scarifier
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also lawn scarifier) a tool with sharp points used for breaking up and removing unwanted grass or plants that are covering the surface of a lawn (= an area of grass): Get rid of dead grass with a rake or scarifier.
a machine with sharp points used for breaking up the surface of the ground or a road: Scarifiers can be used to loosen compacted surfaces or to break up rocky or frozen ground.
More examplesFewer examplesA scarifier removes excess material and allows your grass room to breathe.Scarify the lawn vigorously by raking in two directions with a rake or scarifier.The scarifier is for use with an asphalt concrete roadway refinisher.A scarifier attachment is mounted behind the vehicle.
